trans-unit.source: Describes the width, height, and location of an integer rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 描述整数矩形的宽度、高度和位置。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: *Width*
trans-unit.target: *Width*

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: *Height*
trans-unit.target: *高度*

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: You can also use whitespace instead of commas to delimit values.
trans-unit.target: 你还可用于空格而不是逗号分隔值。

trans-unit.source: Whitespace can also be used with a comma delimited value set.
trans-unit.target: 空白也可以用于一个逗号分隔值设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> instance which specifies the x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />，用于指定矩形左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> instance which specifies the y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />，用于指定矩形左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> instance which specifies the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />，用于指定矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> instance which specifies the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />，用于指定矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" /> coordinates and the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" /> 坐标以及指定的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 来初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the empty rectangle, a special value that represents a rectangle with no position or area.
trans-unit.target: 获取空矩形，这个特殊值表示没有位置或区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: An empty rectangle with no position or area.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有位置或区域的空矩形。

trans-unit.source: This property is the same as calling the constructor using 0 for all parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是与调用的所有参数值使用 0 的构造函数相同。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *属性*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个属性，接受<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect>值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified rectangles are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的矩形是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前矩形进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified rectangle is equal to this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的矩形是否与此矩形相等。

trans-unit.source: **true** if *o* is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> and the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> as this rectangle; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果 o 为一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 并且它与此矩形具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: This operation tests for object equality.
trans-unit.target: 此操作测试对象相等。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle to compare to the current rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前矩形进行比较的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified rectangle is equal to this rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的矩形是否与此矩形相等。

trans-unit.source: **true** if both rectangles have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> as this rectangle; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个矩形具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: This operation tests for object equality.
trans-unit.target: 此操作测试对象相等。

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified rectangles are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的矩形是否相等。

trans-unit.source: **true** if *int32Rect1* and *int32Rect2* have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果 int32Rect1 与 int32Rect2 具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: This operation tests for object equality.
trans-unit.target: 此操作测试对象相等。

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from this rectangle's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 从此矩形的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> 值创建哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle's hash code.
trans-unit.target: 此矩形的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> are greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 属性大于 0。

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> are greater than 0; otherwise, <paramref name="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 属性大于 0，则为 true；否则为 <paramref name="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的高度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the rectangle is empty.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示矩形是否为空。

trans-unit.source: **true** if the rectangle is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果矩形为空; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **true**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**true**。

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Compares two rectangles for exact equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个矩形是否完全相等。

trans-unit.source: **true** if *int32Rect1* and *int32Rect2* have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果 int32Rect1 与 int32Rect2 具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Equals%28System.Windows.Int32Rect%2CSystem.Windows.Int32Rect%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: The second rectangle to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Compares two rectangles for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个矩形是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: **false** if *int32Rect1* and *int32Rect2* have the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />; otherwise, if all of these values are the same, then **true**.
trans-unit.target: 如果 int32Rect1 与 int32Rect2 具有相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" />，则为 false；如果它们的这些值不完全相同，则为 true。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是求反运算的<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Equals%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> structure from the specified <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 表示形式创建一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 等效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置值格式的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定格式对当前实例的值设置格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 采用指定格式的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.IFormattable> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the same <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> values of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，其中包含与此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.X" /> 结构相同的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Y" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Width" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Height" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The format provider to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If provider is <see langword="null" />, the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供程序为 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> based on the supplied <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 创建此 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Int32Rect" /> 实例的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置矩形左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 矩形左上角的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。
